mapper.update: update orderinfo set Status=1 where OrderID=#{orderID} and Status=0
mapper.select: select csi.OrderID,mt.name,csi.Description,oi.Time from comselectinfo csi,milktea mt,orderinfo oi where csi.OrderID = oi.OrderID and csi.id in (mt.id) and oi.Status=1 group by mt.name, csi.OrderID, csi.Description, oi.Time order by oi.Time DESC
